boardgame.name: No Retreat! The Russian Front
boardgame.description: (from GMT's website:)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;No Retreat: The Russian Front is a new deluxe edition of the two-player Victory Point Games 2008 CSR Award Nominee wargame that retells the story of the titanic struggle between the invading armies of Nazi Germany versus Communist Russia during WW2 at a player-friendly and manageable level of scope and difficulty. This edition combines both the original game and its two extensions (Na Berlin! and No Surrender!) using deluxe components of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Twilight Struggle Deluxe Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; quality. With only 40 Army/Front sized counters for the Tournament game, and 70 for the whole campaign, and with very low stacking, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s a quick-playing yet realistic affair that favours the strategic and offensive-minded player._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn is alight with intriguing on-board challenges plus the surprise of card hand Events as players vie to win in one of three different ways._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In a skillfully blended collation of classic hex-based wargaming and modern card-driven simulations, No Retreat: The Russian Front stays truly story-centric, providing the proper feel of sweeping maneuvers, exploitation and encirclements across the vast steppes and forests of Russia. With a simple-yet-innovative economic model, players will also feel the growing might and sophistication of the Russian_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Red Army, and the degradation of the once-invincible German Wehrmacht, over the epic four year sweep of time that this merciless campaign was fought._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Neither side can afford the disgrace of yielding an inch of ground to their hated foe, so your orders are: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;No Retreat!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Components:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One Standard size mounted map_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Two Counter Sheets_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; One deck of 55 Playing Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rule booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Scenario booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Player Aid Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Two 6-sided dice (1 black and 1 white)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;TIME SCALE: 2 months per turn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;MAP SCALE: 100km / 60 miles per hex_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;UNIT SCALE: Armies and Fronts_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;NUMBER OF PLAYERS: 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DESIGNER: Carl Paradis_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DEVELOPER: Alan Emrich _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Carl Paradis_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;COUNTER ART: Mark Simonitch _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Carl Paradis_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;MAP ART: Mark Simonitch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is just for a pack of Artscow Cards - not the complete game. I recently received a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;as new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; copy of the game and it included the Artscow Card Pack. These cards replace the normal game cards, essentially providing the same information but including thematic pictures and images. They look a lot prettier than the bland textual normal cards. See this thread to get an idea of the project http://boardgamegeek.com/thread/723894/creating-an-artscow-deck-for-no-retreat-the-russia/page/2 So I have two sets of cards, I only need one, and although the Arstcow cards look a lot nicer I find the originals slightly easier to read with age impaired eyesight. Condition is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;as new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;. I have literally only opened the packet to look at the cards - never played with them. Any questions, please don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate to ask. Would prefer to send to the UK only. Payment of Cheque, Bank Transfer or Cash on Collection. Postage on top at actual cost or you are welcome to collect (West Sussex). Cheers, Nigel

This item is posted as a part of the WargameHQ Shelf Clearing Auction. This lot includes: No Retreat! The Russian Front Vast The item listed is only for purchase by: schroddycat The price has been set at the winning bid, or Buy It Now, price posted to the auction item comment page. If you won multiple items, please be sure to add them all to your cart at once and then check out so I can include them in your shipping estimate. As a reminder: I will only ship to the addresses within the United States. I only accept PayPal and payment details will be sent alongside your final invoice. Your item(s) will ship on the Saturday FOLLOWING verified payment. I will provide tracking information for your item and insurance sufficient to cover the final price of the auction on shipped items. Please inspect your items within the first 5 business days of receipt, beyond that I cannot assist with disputes. I also make no guarantees implied or otherwise as to the condition of games if the carrier has been rough with shipping. I pack games in peanuts and try to ensure both the games and their contents are secured inside the boxes to minimize issues. If you fail to pay for your item within 5 business days, I will cancel the sale and list the item on eBay and you can re-bid on it there at that time. If you have any special requests, please Geekmail me so we can discuss prior to payment finalization. Thank you for your purchase and I hope you enjoy your new game(s)!
